tasks.name: Holiday High-Five
tasks.description: Get three different people to high-five you.

tasks.name: Santa Hat Heist
tasks.description: Acquire another guest’s Santa hat without directly asking for it.

tasks.name: Frozen in Place
tasks.description: Whenever someone says a specific word (e.g., “holiday,” “tree,” or “cheer”), you must freeze in place and can only say, “I’m frozen!” You can only be unfrozen by a specific guest or if someone offers you a specific item.

tasks.name: Christmas Kiss
tasks.description: Blow a kiss to 5 guests.

tasks.name: Drink Double
tasks.description: Get another guest to clink glasses with you and say 'Cheers to Santa.' You may not drink until they also say 'Cheers to Santa.'

tasks.name: Three’s a Jingle
tasks.description: Sing the first X lines of a holiday song out loud. If someone joins in, you must restart the song.

tasks.name: Gift Wrap Waddle
tasks.description: Wrap yourself in a scarf, blanket, or jacket and waddle around like a gift until someone 'unwraps' you.

tasks.name: Hug Everyone
tasks.description: Give 3 guests hugs.

tasks.name: Unlikely Duo
tasks.description: Get two people to sing a holiday jingle with you without explaining why.

tasks.name: Merry Mimic
tasks.description: Copy someone’s movements or gestures until they notice.

tasks.name: Skibidi Rizz
tasks.description: Make someone say 'Skibidi rizz' without using the phrase yourself.

tasks.name: Secretly Switch
tasks.description: Switch drinks with another guest and finish theirs before they notice.

tasks.name: Token Collecting
tasks.description: Gather four red items from other guests without revealing why you need them.

tasks.name: Lost Item
tasks.description: Pretend to lose something and enlist 2 people to help find it without explaining why.

tasks.name: Freeze Frame
tasks.description: Stop moving whenever someone says 'Christmas' and don’t resume until someone 'thaws' you.

tasks.name: Christmas Klepto
tasks.description: Take an ornament off the tree, show it to a random person and say, 'Look what I found!'

tasks.name: RPS Champ
tasks.description: Secretly win five rounds of rock-paper-scissors against different guests.

tasks.name: Photo Gesture
tasks.description: Grab [person] to take pictures with you without speaking. Use only hand gestures.

tasks.name: Simple Speaker
tasks.description: Speak using only 1-syllable words.

tasks.name: Reindeer Recruiter
tasks.description: Convince someone to give you their best reindeer impression. Bonus points if they act it out.

tasks.name: Colorful Cocktail
tasks.description: Have someone make you a [cocktail], but you can only describe it using colors. You cannot say anything else. Do not use hand gestures. Bonus points if they make it for you correctly.

tasks.name: Holiday Accent
tasks.description: Use an exaggerated British accent until someone points it out.

tasks.name: Christmas Spirit Shout
tasks.description: Anytime someone takes a shot, yell, 'NOW THAT'S CHRISTMAS SPIRIT!'

tasks.name: Nutcracker Nod
tasks.description: Curtsy whenever you receive or give an item to another guest.

tasks.name: The Merry March
tasks.description: Take exaggerated steps or a slight skip, as if crossing a large gap, whenever you cross a threshold or doorway.

tasks.name: Drink Double
tasks.description: Get another guest to clink glasses with you and say 'Cheers to Santa.' You may not drink until they also say 'Cheers to Santa', but you cannot tell them this.

tasks.name: Gift Wrap Waddle
tasks.description: Wrap yourself in a scarf, blanket, or jacket and waddle around like a gift until someone 'unwraps' you.
